desc: Lit Seduction candles are made with 100% Coconut & soy wax using a woven cotton/wooden wicks. Every candle is hand poured in small batches in Stockton Ca, to ensure you are given the best quality and scent in every order.

layout.text: “The climax of seduction is to give the illusion that you’re not trying to seduce.”–Mathias Malzieu
